refnamediv.refpurpose: C interface macro which returns the number of input parameters present in the calling Scilab function

listitem.para: the number of input parameters present in the calling Scilab function

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: C interface macro which returns the number of input parameters present in the calling Scilab function. You must include stack-c.h to benefit from this function.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.para: In this example, the C interface function can take several inpur parameters and prints in the Scilab console the integer corresponding to the number of input parameters detected in the calling Scilab function.
